about_the_game:
The new unit "Bartgreisse" has been unlocked and will join the Clausewitz Battalion.

As starter items, he comes with the following equipment:
- Art of Battle: Critical Hit Rate +10%
- 2 Steel Swords: Attack Power +2 each
